items.sentence: Tom spent the night in the haunted house by himself.
I certainly do hope that you've learned your lesson.
How many years ago did you realize you were adopted?
The room the kidnappers locked me in had no windows.
The plants must've died because nobody watered them.
I know it's highly unlikely that anyone can help me.
Tom will live in Australia for at least three years.
Tom went to Australia to live with his grandparents.
Most people stuck around for a while after the show.
We are eating now. Could you please call back later?
